name: Word Corpus
description:
If you enjoy playing on-line word games then this app is a great companion for helping you discover words.

Just type a few letters or a word and quickly find words based on your letters.

Found words are sorted into five groups:

- Words that begin with your word
- Words that end with your word
- Words that contain your word
- Words that contain all the letters in your word in any order
- Anagrams of your word
